caption.p: The mRNA levels of the key co-targets HSP90AA1, PPARG and STAT1 were adjusted by the flavonoids of SCST. ( A– C) The relative mRNA levels of Pparg, Hsp90aa1 and Stat1 in each intervention group ( n = 3). Mean values ± SD are presented. ** P < 0.01 vs. the control group, * P < 0.05 vs. the control group.
